content:
Example 1:
Text: I think my 5 week old is already spoiled. She won't sleep more then 15mins unless I'm holding her
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 2:
Text: @endlessblush It's a Panasonic Lumix. J dropped it, bent around the lens. If the lens need recalibrating it'll be expensive... 6 mths old
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 3:
Text: ear ache.....random! & it hurts like a bitch   SOSOSOSO bored seriously im fifteen years old and it summer; thats fucked up!
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 4:
Text: off work with a poorly 4 yr old, no excuse not to do any cleaning now
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: @CosmicMother Ah Russ!  Listening & Loving it! Wish I could go back to those days, love the oldie films & songs! 2 do - Build Time Machine
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 6:
Text: @JMIKE3 U no that little prob with ur twitter that happen @ that old pep resteraunt! mayb this will help u fix it
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 7:
Text: @therealdjjelly has no dunk ryders, young cash, or bizzle...  ...atleast hes taking it back, not all futuristic.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 8:
Text: http://twitpic.com/6plus - i got dave a new bonsai... his old one died last year  so this is steve jr. (dave named his bonsai steve... ...
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: don't ask my why i have a new account...it's cuz twitter is LAME and my old one got deleted somehow.  wah wah wah
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: Greenifyer didn't work for me, made me all black  so here's my new avatar, greenified the (very) oldfashioned way :p
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 11:
Text: Noooo! Goodbye my rain boots. They are too young to die...
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: @elizabethlovesj Happy Birthday 18 year old! Party time.
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 13:
Text: garage sale tomorrow! in DIRE need to dispose old stuff.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 14:
Text: Just finished visiting some old coworkers. My truck won't go in reverse. Call outlaw and she said she was gonna bring kids home anyway.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: http://twitpic.com/680to - I also layed in her older sister's room & pet their cat, Baxter.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: acsvxdcbgfn soccer now. shall see young phoebe after D: I don't want her dressed up though
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 17:
Text: @Lyssajo You're lucky. My downgraded Motorola Q9M with old Windows Mobile 6 doesn't have a Copy/Paste function.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: @riandawson hit the lights. old school
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: Reconnected with old pal from high school. Whoa. Great fun. Good night New York. Thank you.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 20:
Text: miss my old hair.  http://tinyurl.com/pqpvsl http://plurk.com/p/z0kyf
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 21:
Text: Weekend is over, back at work   Finally all moved out of the old apartment. Still need better cable and internet in the new one.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: downloading good old music
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 23:
Text: @BeautyBlogger Wish my blog qualified.  Not 3 months old yet
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: my laptop just did something really freaky. eek! it's only a year old!!!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 25:
Text: looking into socialization classes for Oreo... If any old dog can learn new tricks, it's him.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: trying to rest after a 1 hour drive turned into a 2 hour and 15min drive thanks to my crying 7 month old
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 27:
Text: so far so good new lappy top is working ... old boy PC is no more RIP
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: im in a chill mood. feelin like watchin sum oldskoo movies like boys n the hood or bullet.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 29:
Text: @tezzer57 You are a braver man than I. I'm still wrestling with the fact I was amused by a distressed 9 year old. I'm a bad person.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: @hippofloat Sounds great man. I'm bringing my oldest daughter tonight, Alyssa. She'll be in 7th grade this fall. A youth   She's pumped
Annotation from annotator: 3

Text: @uncivilized I just had to explain hyper colour to a 22 year old. I'm old
Annotation from annotator:
